July 2, 1889 D Boston Contest
Boston Contest 10 Other Boston Contest boston-contest
Own Choice Test Piece Contest
Wide Bargate, Boston, Lincolnshire, England, UK Boston Horse, Dog, Poultry and Horticultural Show 6 bands entered, 5 bands competed Prizes: £45, £15, £10, £5 Best uniform: 1. Leeds Forge, 2. Black Dyke
Jan. 29, 2013, 6:27 p.m. Sept. 4, 2016, 6:35 p.m.
